      • getDisplayName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Return the display name assigned to the object. Note that this is the actual display name, which may not be defined. Use @link RoomService.getRoomVUBNotation(Room) to get the way in which rooms should be displayed to the user.
        Returns:
        the display naem assigned to this room (may return empty string if undefined)
